            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【最新发现！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%84%E4%BB%8A%E9%93%B6%E6%B2%B3%E7%B3%BB%E8%87%AA%E8%BD%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BF%AB%E6%81%92%E6%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#迄今银河系自转最快恒星#</a>】中国科学院国家天文台研究团队基于郭守敬望远镜数据，发现一颗迄今银河系自转速度最快的恒星，其自转速度约为540千米/秒，比目前银河系中自转速度第二快的恒星约快100千米/秒。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%A9%E6%96%87%E5%AD%A6%E5%AE%B6%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B0%E8%BF%84%E4%BB%8A%E9%93%B6%E6%B2%B3%E7%B3%BB%E8%87%AA%E8%BD%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BF%AB%E6%81%92%E6%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#中国天文学家发现迄今银河系自转最快恒星#</a>（央视）&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492482580604761:1034-video:1034%3A4492482302640148:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492482580604761:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wLFNPj" alt="http://t.cn/A6wLFNPj" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                                                                                                        【等你们平安回来！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%B5%B4%E4%BF%84%E7%BD%97%E6%96%AF%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%8A%E6%97%A5%E5%90%AF%E7%A8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#中国赴俄罗斯抗疫专家组今日启程#</a>】今天上午，中国政府赴俄罗斯抗疫医疗专家组一行10人，从哈尔滨启程，赴俄协助开展疫情防控工作。专家组由国家卫生健康委组建，黑龙江省卫生健康委选派。成员来自中国疾病预防控制中心、黑龙江省疾病预防控制中心、黑龙江省传染病防治院、哈尔滨医 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICNApwd3L" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492470777676701:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492470777676701&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=ICNsFBWDh&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492465979043523" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICNsFBWDh?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-11 10:06" date="1586570818000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492465979043523:fromprofile"> 2020-4-11 10:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【正在直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E4%BC%AF%E7%A4%BC%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E8%8D%AF%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%23&amp;from=default">#张伯礼院士介绍中医药抗疫经验#</a>】为充分发挥中医药在抗击新冠肺炎疫情中的独特作用和价值，帮助海外留学生和侨胞更好地预防应对疾病，驻洛杉矶总领馆特邀张伯礼院士介绍中医药抗疫经验，讲解中医药防治新冠肺炎的方法和优势，并在线交流。正在直播↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492465979043523:1034-video:1034%3A4492494453538840:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492465979043523:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wLROhs" alt="http://t.cn/A6wLROhs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【解封不等于解防！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E5%9C%A8%E4%BB%8D%E6%9C%AA%E5%88%B0%E6%94%BE%E6%9D%BE%E7%9A%84%E6%97%B6%E5%80%99%23&amp;from=default">#现在仍未到放松的时候#</a>】防控见成效但病毒未降伏，一时大意可能前功尽弃。打开城门不是打开家门，少串门少聚集，口罩、洗手、分餐依然要牢记。转发倡议，珍惜来之不易的防疫成果，切莫放松警惕！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A7%BB%E6%B0%91%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%B1%80%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E5%9C%A8%E5%8D%8E%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E7%9F%A5%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E6%B3%95%E8%A7%84%23&amp;from=default">#移民管理局发布在华外国人应知法律法规#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E5%8D%8E%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E6%A3%80%E7%96%AB%E5%B0%86%E6%89%BF%E6%8B%85%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E8%B4%A3%E4%BB%BB%23&amp;from=default">#在华外国人拒绝检疫将承担法律责任#</a>】4月10日，国家移民管理局发布通知，汇集了涉外籍人士疫情防控权利义务的相关法律规定，希望所有在中国境内的外籍人士严格遵守，积极配合防疫措施，共同防范疫情风险。当事人如拒绝执行健康申报、体温检测、流行病学调 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICN8vp0V9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492453475961743:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492453475961743&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E3%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增3例本土病例#</a>：为境外输入关联病例】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=健康广东">@健康广东</a> ：4月10日0-24时，广东新增境外输入确诊病例1例，为广州报告（来自法国，入境口岸发现，入关后即被隔离观察）。全省累计报告境外输入确诊病例179例。<br><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B3%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增境外输入关联确诊病例3例#</a>，为广州报告（密切接触者隔离排查2例、医疗机构发热门 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICN3IsKlG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492450506851352:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492450506851352&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/ICN3IsKlG&amp;mid=4492450506851352&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1gdpjwo75jjj20ob0obk0y" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>385</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增4例本土病例#</a>】4月10日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中42例为境外输入病例，4例为本土病例（广东3例，黑龙江1例）。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%85%B1%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东黑龙江共新增4例本土病例#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E34%E4%BE%8B%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增34例无症状感染者#</a>】4月10日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者34例，其中境外输入无症状感染者7例；当日转为确诊病例14例（境外输入14例）；当日解除医学观察25例（境外输入4例）。尚在医学观察无症状感染者1092例（境外输入338例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A46%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊46例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%85%B1%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东黑龙江共新增4例本土病例#</a>】4月10日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例46例，其中42例为境外输入病例，4例为本土病例（广东3例，黑龙江1例）；新增死亡病例3例（湖北3例）；新增疑似病例8例，均为境外输入病例（黑龙江5例，上海2例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICMVIkSUt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492445544977637:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492445544977637&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/ICMVIkSUt&amp;mid=4492445544977637&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1gdpk8vnvmdj20u01ek13i" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>229</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%E6%8E%A5%E5%8F%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E6%8D%90%E8%B5%A0%E5%8F%8A%E6%8D%90%E6%AC%BE%23&amp;from=default">#绥芬河接受物资捐赠及捐款#</a>】9日，绥芬河市发布疫情防控指挥部第二十号通告，宣布接受社会物资捐赠及捐款。接受捐赠的物资包括N95口罩等防护物资、体温检测设备、消杀物资。通告称，物资捐赠请先行电话联系，沟通捐赠意向，得到确认后再行捐赠。详见↓↓帮扩！<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6w2o3mR" alt="http://t.cn/A6w2o3mR" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B3147577%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊升至147577例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%81%E5%9F%8E%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%E5%86%8D%E5%BB%B6%E9%95%BF%23&amp;from=default">#意大利全国封城措施再延长#</a>】根据意大利民事保护部门公布的最新数据，截至当地时间4月10日18时，意大利现有新冠肺炎确诊病例98273例，死亡18849例，治愈30455例，累计确诊病例147577例，较4月9日18时新增确诊3951例，新增570例死亡病例。<br>意大利总理孔特当地时间4月1 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICMsr9eGw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492427392201404:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492427392201404&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492417371761873" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICMch7olj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-11 06:53" date="1586559229000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492417371761873:fromprofile"> 2020-4-11 06:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%83%9F%E5%8F%B0%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E5%B0%B1%E9%B2%8D%E6%9F%90%E6%9F%90%E6%A1%88%E7%BB%84%E6%88%90%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E4%B8%93%E7%8F%AD%23&amp;from=default">#烟台公安就鲍某某案组成工作专班#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%83%9F%E5%8F%B0%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A5%E6%AD%A3%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%E9%B2%8D%E6%9F%90%E6%9F%90%E6%A1%88%23&amp;from=default">#烟台警方通报正全面调查鲍某某案#</a>11日凌晨，烟台市公安局发布通报：关于一女子控告鲍某某性侵一案，公安局已组成工作专班，并商请烟台市人民检察院派员参加，对前期芝罘公安分局侦办的案件事实及公众关注的相关问题正在进行全面调查。调查结果将及时公开，接受社 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICMch7olj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492417371761873:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492417371761873&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8749%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过49万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间4月10日下午6点，美国已经至少有新冠病毒感染病例492240例，其中包括死亡病例18350例。与大约24小时前相比，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%87%B3%E5%B0%91%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E37936%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国确诊病例至少新增37936例#</a>，死亡病例至少增加了2083例。<br>在当天举行的白宫记者会上，美国总 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICM5orHYZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492413106603929:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492413106603929&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=ICJiYqsdZ&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492306206305027" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICJiYqsdZ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 23:32" date="1586532725000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492306206305027:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 23:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】全国多地公布开学时间，一些毕业班一人一桌的开课见证了这个春天的特殊。超长假期、在线学习、高考延期，这届考生极不平凡的经历，已经是人生的另一场大考。从某种意义上，开学倒计时也是疫情倒计时，但可以开学又不等于能够松懈，复学后依然要重防疫。张弛有度，让校园步入正轨。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492295334037144" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICJ1rgWfe?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 22:48" date="1586530133000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492295334037144:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 22:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：别爱太满，别睡太晚，别想太多】每个人对幸福都有不同的定义，对烦恼也未必有相同的理解，不要拿自己的生活去丈量别人的生活。人生宝贵，别爱太满，才能愉悦享受感情的甜蜜；别睡太晚，才能轻松摆脱烦恼的纠缠；别想太多，才能让自己逍遥又自在。学会给自己留白，才能无限接近人生最美的状态。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICJ1rgWfe" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492295334037144:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492295334037144&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

                    <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut">【夜读】别爱太满，别睡太晚，别想太多</h4>
                                            <div class="WB_feed_spec_brieftxt"><span class="S_txt2">凡事有度，太过用力的人往往走不远。</span></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【传承！这是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%91%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#疫情下的中国少年#</a>】全国哀悼时隔墙敬礼的小学生；踮起脚尖向募捐箱里放自己压岁钱的孩子；给医护敬礼，说“没有他们，我们不可能安稳上课”的小姑娘；给拾荒者戴口罩的男孩；向撤离的援鄂医护大喊“欢迎你们到武汉来玩”的武汉娃…善良、感恩、温暖，这就是代表中国未来的小小少年↓↓ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【抱拳了！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A7%94%E5%86%85%E7%91%9E%E6%8B%89%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%9F%E5%8F%8C%E6%89%8B%E6%8A%B1%E6%8B%B3%E8%87%B4%E6%84%8F%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%BB%84%23&amp;from=default">#委内瑞拉总统双手抱拳致意中国医疗专家组#</a>】4月8日，在委内瑞拉加拉加斯总统府，总统马杜罗向中国医疗专家组抱拳致意。马杜罗表示，感谢中方对委内瑞拉提供的支持，感谢中国抗疫医疗专家组来委，与当地医疗人员和专家分享抗击新冠疫情的经验与委方共同完善防疫措施。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492282919142428:2017607-video:2017607%3A4492271718957059:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492282919142428:2803301701" title="海客新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w2tdKE" alt="http://t.cn/A6w2tdKE" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>海客新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%86%8D%E6%8A%AB%E6%88%98%E8%A2%8D%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%23&amp;from=default">#援鄂医生再披战袍驰援绥芬河#</a>，致敬！】牡丹江医学院附属红旗医院医生倪薪，2月12日起随黑龙江医疗队征战武汉，38天后凯旋。刚结束隔离的她本应和家人团聚，但得知绥芬河口岸疫情严峻，她义无反顾再次踏上征程。 致敬！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%88%9A%E7%BB%93%E6%9D%9F%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%9A%84%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E5%86%8D%E6%88%98%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%23&amp;from=default">#刚结束隔离的援鄂医生再战绥芬河#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报视频">@人民日报视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492276636455376:1034-video:1034%3A4492259346022432:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492276636455376:2803301701" title="人民日报视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w224Jr" alt="http://t.cn/A6w224Jr" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <ul class="WB_media_a WB_media_a_m1 clearfix">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492272244630053" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICIqcjquh?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 21:17" date="1586524628000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492272244630053:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 21:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【山东省教育厅：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%8F%AF%E7%94%B3%E8%AF%B7%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E5%90%8E%E6%9A%82%E4%B8%8D%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%23&amp;from=default">#山东高三学生可申请开学后暂不返校#</a>】据山东省教育厅官方微信消息，山东省教育厅新冠肺炎疫情处置工作领导小组发布关于做好高中毕业年级开学后走读学生疫情防控工作的通知。高中毕业年级学生若申请开学后不返校，应提前向学校提供不返校的书面说明，承诺自主在家学习、不需学校线上教 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICIqcjquh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492272244630053:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492272244630053&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【世界首次！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A6%8F%E5%BB%BA%E9%BE%99%E5%B2%A9%E5%A4%A7%E6%A1%A5%E5%AE%9E%E7%8E%B0%E7%8B%AC%E5%A1%94%E5%8D%95%E8%BD%AC%23&amp;from=default">#福建龙岩大桥实现独塔单转#</a>】4月10日，福建龙岩大桥百米高万吨主塔完成逆时针69度旋转，开创世界钢箱梁斜拉桥二次转体施工（独塔单转和塔梁共转）的先河。“独塔单转”即“宝石”型扁平状主塔先以平行于铁路的方向进行修建，使主塔塔身距离铁路的最小距离从6.5米增大到接近20米。主塔施工 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICHMHAllj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492247758661853:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492247758661853&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492241806533133" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICHD6rpz7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 19:16" date="1586517371000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492241806533133:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 19:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【没有学生和游客，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E5%AE%89%E4%BA%A4%E5%A4%A7%E8%90%BD%E6%A8%B1%E9%93%BA%E6%BB%A1%E6%A8%B1%E8%8A%B1%E5%A4%A7%E9%81%93%23&amp;from=default">#西安交大落樱铺满樱花大道#</a>】疫情防控的特殊时期，今年西安交大樱花大道上没有了以往赏樱的学子和熙熙攘攘的游客，却依然缤纷盛放，花期也较往年更长。4月10日，一场春雨过后，校园内的落樱铺满了校园里的樱花道，美如仙境。（华商报） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>114112</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492226425853038" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICHeioyDQ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 18:15" date="1586513704000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492226425853038:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 18:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%90%91127%E4%B8%AA%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%92%8C4%E4%B8%AA%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%23&amp;from=default">#中国向127个国家和4个国际组织援助物资#</a>】4月10日，外交部发言人赵立坚介绍，中方在力所能及的范围内向国际社会提供支持和帮助。截至目前，中国政府已经或正在向127个国家和4个国际组织提供包括医用口罩、防护服、检测试剂等在内的物资援助。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492226425853038:1034-video:1034%3A4492206875017243:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492226425853038:2803301701" title="人民视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wAS6HA" alt="http://t.cn/A6wAS6HA" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492224970711306" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICHbX2Z2G?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 18:09" date="1586513356000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492224970711306:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 18:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【瞒着家人奔赴战疫一线 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E8%A7%81%E5%88%B0%E8%80%81%E6%AF%8D%E4%BA%B2%E4%B8%8B%E8%B7%AA%E9%81%93%E6%AD%89%23&amp;from=default">#山东援鄂医护见到老母亲下跪道歉#</a>】4月5日，山东援鄂第二批返鲁人员结束休整返程回家。今年45岁的栗先芝是枣庄市台儿庄区中医院的主管护师，她瞒着家人写下请战书。因为走得突然，再加上怕年岁已高的母亲担心，她并没有告诉母亲。平安回来后，栗先芝一见到母亲便跪地道歉。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICHbX2Z2G" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492224970711306:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492224970711306&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492210898927764" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICGPfBswc?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 17:13" date="1586510002000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492210898927764:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 17:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%A7%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%9C%A8%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E6%89%A9%E6%95%A3%23&amp;from=default">#世卫称新冠疫情在非洲持续扩散#</a>】当地时间4月9日，世卫组织非洲区域办事处主任丽贝卡·莫蒂博士表示，新冠肺炎确诊病例数在撒哈拉以南的非洲多国持续增长。在许多国家，疫情已经从首都扩散至其他城市。至少有<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2316%E4%B8%AA%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E5%A4%A7%E9%87%8F%E7%A4%BE%E5%8C%BA%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#16个非洲国家出现大量社区传播病例#</a>。在接下来的几天中，世卫组织将向30个非洲国家运送由 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICGPfBswc" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492210898927764:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492210898927764&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492204179772931" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICGEpF0nV?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 16:46" date="1586508400000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492204179772931:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 16:46</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民微评：盼真相大白】某上市公司高管被指性侵“养女”四年，令人骇然！那些摧折人心的细节是否属实？全社会有责任求证，执法机关更有责任调查。呵护未成年人是文明底线，更是法治底线。法律问题须在法治轨道内解决。事关重大，不容烟云缭绕，不容雾失楼台，盼真相大白！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5%E8%AF%84%E9%B2%8D%E6%AF%93%E6%98%8E%E8%A2%AB%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#人民日报评鲍毓明被查#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【4月12日起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%9B%E4%BA%AC%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%85%A5%E4%BD%8F%E9%85%92%E5%BA%97%E9%9C%80%E6%8C%81%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E9%98%B4%E6%80%A7%E8%AF%81%E6%98%8E%23&amp;from=default">#进京人员入住酒店需持核酸阴性证明#</a>】10日，北京市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会上，北京市文化与旅游局一级巡视员周卫民介绍，将进一步严格进京入住酒店人员管控措施。4月12日起，进京人员入住酒店，应持有7日内经当地核酸检测呈阴性的健康证明，且全国健康通行码或北京健康宝认证为 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICGsRm0Sj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492197015246583:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492197015246583&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>
                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4492192506664815&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2803301701%26mid%3D4492192506664815&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609503039&amp;ssig=%2FjBUkppHV8" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492192506664815" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICGlArXP1?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 16:00" date="1586505617000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492192506664815:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E5%B7%A9%E5%9B%BA%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E6%88%90%E6%9E%9C%23&amp;from=default">#湖北介绍巩固疫情防控成果#</a>，加强爱国卫生工作】4月10日下午四点，湖北省新冠疫情防控工作指挥部召开发布会，介绍巩固疫情防控成果，加强爱国卫生工作情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492192506664815:1034-video:1034%3A4492199996620824:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492192506664815:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wAtbAw" alt="http://t.cn/A6wAtbAw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%B2%8D%E6%AF%93%E6%98%8E%E8%A2%AB%E8%A5%BF%E5%8D%97%E6%94%BF%E6%B3%95%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6%E8%A7%A3%E8%81%98%23&amp;from=default">#鲍毓明被西南政法大学解聘#</a>】西南政法大学商学院网站4月10日发布声明，商学院法治企业研究院已解除鲍毓明兼职研究员的聘任，并已通知本人。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492184939937692" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICG9nFHfm?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 15:30" date="1586503813000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492184939937692:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 15:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%BA%E5%9B%B0%E9%9A%BE%E7%BE%A4%E4%BC%97%E5%8F%91%E6%94%BE%E8%A1%A5%E8%B4%B418.8%E4%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全国为困难群众发放补贴18.8亿#</a>】民政部社会救助司一级巡视员伊佩庄表示，截至目前，全国共为6155.3万人次的困难群众发放了补贴18.8亿元，其中低保对象是5446万人次，特困对象是639万人次，低收入家庭等其他困难群众70.3万人次，月人均获得补贴47元，其中湖北省为370万人次，发放了价格补贴4.4亿元 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICG9nFHfm" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492184939937692:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492184939937692&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E7%AA%81%E7%A0%B48%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球单日新增确诊首次突破8万例#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人米锋：最近7日本土新增确诊16例，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%917%E5%A4%A9%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%BE%83%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%80%E5%91%A8%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A011%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#近7天本土新增确诊较前一周增加11例#</a>，要继续做好群防群治，减少不必要聚集。据世卫组织最新通报，全球单日新增确诊病例首次突破8万例。近几日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%8F%E9%99%86%E8%B7%AF%E5%8F%A3%E5%B2%B8%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%8C%81%E7%BB%AD%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A0%23&amp;from=default">#经陆路口岸输入我国病例持续增加#</a>，要进一步提高边境地区 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICG3vn5we" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492181295502762:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492181295502762&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于4月10日15时召开新闻发布会，介绍完善疫情期间困难群体的政策保障工作情况，请国家发展改革委、民政部、财政部、人力资源和社会保障部有关司局负责人回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492177445114160:1034-video:1034%3A4492190848581685:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492177445114160:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wAzU8r" alt="http://t.cn/A6wAzU8r" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B151%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#绥芬河累计境外输入病例151例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E9%A2%84%E8%AE%A1%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%E5%90%AF%E7%94%A8%23&amp;from=default">#绥芬河方舱医院预计明天启用#</a>】据央视，截至4月9日24时，绥芬河报告由俄罗斯入境累计确诊病例151例，累计无症状感染者148例。目前，绥芬河市内已经实施小区封闭管理措施。黑龙江省内222名医疗援助人员已抵达牡丹江市和绥芬河市。由办公楼改建的方舱医院，可提供600 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICFRvCdgU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492173859107484:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492173859107484&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492167324498608" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICFGYiSic?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-10 14:20" date="1586499613000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492167324498608:fromprofile"> 2020-4-10 14:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【即日起，海关对<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%A8%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%AD%8911%E7%B1%BB%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81%E5%AE%9E%E6%96%BD%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%E5%95%86%E5%93%81%E6%A3%80%E9%AA%8C%23&amp;from=default">#医用口罩等11类物品实施出口商品检验#</a>】海关总署10日发布2020年第53号公告，为加强医疗物资出口质量监管，按照《中华人民共和国进出口商品检验法》及其实施条例，海关总署决定对“6307900010”等海关商品编号项下的医疗物资实施出口商品检验，即日生效。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A5323%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#德国新增确诊5323例新冠肺炎#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B3113525%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#德国累计确诊升至113525例#</a>】根据德国疾病防控机构罗伯特·科赫研究所最新公布的数据显示，截至当地时间4月10日0时，德国共确诊113525新冠病毒肺炎感染病例，其中死亡病例2373例，已有53913例痊愈。较4月9日0时，新增5323例，新增死亡266例。<br><br>德国总理默克尔9日表示 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICFw2rrF6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492160546541192:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492160546541192&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

a||(a[g]=d(c));a.css=h=[].concat(a.css||[]);a.cssid=i=[].concat(a.cssid||[]);for(var j=i.length,k=h.length;j<k;++j)i[j]=e(h[j]);b(a)}}()
</script>
<script>FM.view({"domid":"pl_lib","js":"home/js/pl/lib.js?version=737b1bcbc5c6542c","jsDefer":true});</script>

                                                                                                             【解封不等于解防！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E5%9C%A8%E4%BB%8D%E6%9C%AA%E5%88%B0%E6%94%BE%E6%9D%BE%E7%9A%84%E6%97%B6%E5%80%99%23&from=default\">#现在仍未到放松的时候#<\/a>】防控见成效但病毒未降伏，一时大意可能前功尽弃。打开城门不是打开家门，少串门少聚集，口罩、洗手、分餐依然要牢记。转发倡议，珍惜来之不易的防疫成果，切莫放松警惕！ style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民日报\">\n                                                                                                                        【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%A7%BB%E6%B0%91%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%B1%80%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E5%9C%A8%E5%8D%8E%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E7%9F%A5%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E6%B3%95%E8%A7%84%23&from=default\">#移民管理局发布在华外国人应知法律法规#<\/a>：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E5%8D%8E%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%8B%92%E7%BB%9D%E6%A3%80%E7%96%AB%E5%B0%86%E6%89%BF%E6%8B%85%E6%B3%95%E5%BE%8B%E8%B4%A3%E4%BB%BB%23&from=default\">#在华外国人拒绝检疫将承担法律责任#<\/a>】4月10日，国家移民管理局发布通知，汇集了涉外籍人士疫情防控权利义务的相关法律规定，希望所有在中国境内的外籍人士严格遵守，积极配合防疫措施，共同防范疫情风险。当事人如拒绝执行健康申报、体温检测、流行病学调 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2803301701\/ICN8vp0V9\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4492453475961743:2803301701\"                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%83%9F%E5%8F%B0%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E5%B0%B1%E9%B2%8D%E6%9F%90%E6%9F%90%E6%A1%88%E7%BB%84%E6%88%90%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E4%B8%93%E7%8F%AD%23&from=default\">#烟台公安就鲍某某案组成工作专班#<\/a>】<a
